recipes.title: Best Salad in the World
recipes.description: This is a recipe for the best tasting salad in the world. It has lots of carrots and lettuce!
instructions: add lettuce leaves to a large bowl
then add the carrots the bowl
then mix ingredients together in the bowl

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipes.description: This was a recipe handed down to me by my grandmother Ruth who use to make the best chocolate chip cookies!
instructions: add the rest of the ingredients to the bowl
then evenly place small clumps of cookie dough on a baking sheet
place baking sheet in oven for 12 minutes at 350 degrees F

recipes.title: Cinco de Nachos
recipes.description: I discovered this recipe when I went on a trip to Mexico. A nice lady taught me how to make world famous nachos.
instructions: spread tortilla chips on a large plate
warm up beans in a pot on the stove
sprinkle the shredded chesse on top of the chips
place plate in the oven for 10 minutes at 350 degrees F
finally remove plate from oven and spread refriend beans on top of the chips
